# Exploring the Content Browser Menu

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/exploring-the-content-browser-menu-in-fortnite-creative
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T23:54:03.081874

---

The **Content** browser is where you can access the Fortnite Creative inventory and tools to create your gameplay experiences.

[![Content Browser](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/74feb316-748a-4f70-b591-3c9b0873181d?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/74feb316-748a-4f70-b591-3c9b0873181d?resizing_type=fit)

Follow the steps below to access the **Content** browser.

1. Spawn into your Creative island.
2. Press **~** on your keyboard to select the **Phone Tool**.
3. Press **Tab** on your keyboard to open the **Content** browser.

The assets within the **Content** browser are updated with every update. With this growing inventory, you can easily use sidebars and filters to find assets by name, theme, and even tags.

## Content Browser Sidebars

[![Sidebars](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/5bb39130-6f16-4c38-89d1-9fbf44a3ecf9?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/5bb39130-6f16-4c38-89d1-9fbf44a3ecf9?resizing_type=fit)

The Creative inventory holds all of the assets to create both the environment and mechanics of your unique gameplay experiences.

Because of the wide range of tools offered, you can easily navigate through assets using the left and right sidebars.

The left sidebar displays the [Categories panel](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/exploring-the-content-browser-menu-in-fortnite-creative#categories-panel), which contains a **search bar** and categories to help you locate the assets offered. The right sidebar displays both the [Details panel](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/exploring-the-content-browser-menu-in-fortnite-creative#details-panel) and **Filters** tabs to sort through assets by tags.

Press **CTRL + R**, or select the side arrows to expand or collapse the left and right panels.

### Categories Panel

[![Details Panel](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/1e2410fc-9d14-42d2-a12e-cc6448ba830f?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/1e2410fc-9d14-42d2-a12e-cc6448ba830f?resizing_type=fit)

The left sidebar is the **Categories** panel, which sorts the Creative inventory assets into categories. You can also use the search bar to search for assets by name.

Within the **Categories** sidebar, you can expand the contents displayed for the following categories that contain the Creative inventory:

- [Home](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/exploring-the-content-browser-menu-in-fortnite-creative#home)
- [Prefabs](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/exploring-the-content-browser-menu-in-fortnite-creative)
- [Gallery](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/exploring-the-content-browser-menu-in-fortnite-creative)
- [Devices](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/exploring-the-content-browser-menu-in-fortnite-creative#devices)
- [Weapons](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/exploring-the-content-browser-menu-in-fortnite-creative#weapons)
- [Items](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/exploring-the-content-browser-menu-in-fortnite-creative#items)
- [Chest](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/exploring-the-content-browser-menu-in-fortnite-creative#chest)

### Home

[![Home Category](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/4a93c314-1c18-43c3-9ff0-3bde1cd096f9?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/4a93c314-1c18-43c3-9ff0-3bde1cd096f9?resizing_type=fit)

Opening the **Content** browser will take you to the **Home** category. This displays a collection of featured assets from each category below it.

### Prefabs and Galleries

[![Prefabs and Galleries](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/5a71dc35-d0f7-4d33-81ba-f171c2e9acd5?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/5a71dc35-d0f7-4d33-81ba-f171c2e9acd5?resizing_type=fit)

Hone your level design skills by using assets from the [Prefabs and Galleries](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/using-prefabs-and-galleries-in-fortnite-creative) categories.

The **Prefabs** category holds sets of pre-built structures furnished with props. The **Galleries** category holds individual assets sorted by theme that contain building assets and props to build and decorate your environment.

Combine assets from these categories to create unique environments like [Lava Cave](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/uefn/lava-cave-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite) that suit your gameplay's theme.

### Devices

[![Devices](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/cd6f4c23-bae5-420c-a4da-7ad59f5db4a6?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/cd6f4c23-bae5-420c-a4da-7ad59f5db4a6?resizing_type=fit)

Create game mechanics on your island with the assets offered from the [Devices](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/using-devices-in-fortnite) category. This category contains a wide range of devices you can use to create an infinite variety of unique gameplay experiences.

Combine devices like the [Player Spawner](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/using-player-spawn-pad-devices-in-fortnite-creative) and [Post Process](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/using-post-processing-devices-in-fortnite-creative) device to create gameplays such as [**Prop Hunt**](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/uefn/verse-prop-hunt-template-in-unreal-editor-for-fortnite) that leave your players craving more.

For more inspiration on how to use devices, see [Device Design Examples](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/device-design-examples-in-fortnite-creative).

### Weapons

[![Weapons](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/c78762b3-e42f-4482-9baa-3a85db0bb357?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/c78762b3-e42f-4482-9baa-3a85db0bb357?resizing_type=fit)

Use assetss from the **Weapons** category to add the necessary weapons for your players to use during gameplay.

Combine weapons with devices like the [Item Spawner](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/using-item-spawner-devices-in-fortnite-creative) **Sideways Minigun** to recreate combat games such as [Creature Rush](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/design-a-creature-rush-game-in-fortnite-creative).

### Items

[![Items](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/f75e89d5-0982-4519-b9c4-51d13432dda7?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/f75e89d5-0982-4519-b9c4-51d13432dda7?resizing_type=fit)

The **[Items](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/using-items-in-fortnite-creative)** category contains assets that players can use to fulfill device requirements and add status effects.

Pair devices like the **[Conditional Button](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/using-conditional-button-devices-in-fortnite-creative)** with [objective items](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/using-objective-items-in-fortnite-creative) to create gameplay mechanics such as Jewel Thief, where players must collect assets to unlock devices.

### Chest

[![Chest](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/401eb55a-1811-485b-9f15-8add17bfc25c?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/401eb55a-1811-485b-9f15-8add17bfc25c?resizing_type=fit)

The **Chest** is where you can store assets from the **Weapons** and **Items** categories to grant players through in-game chests or llamas.

[![Add To Chest](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/c71e1b2a-7f12-4948-849a-d42caa36bd57?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/c71e1b2a-7f12-4948-849a-d42caa36bd57?resizing_type=fit)

To add assets to the **Chest** tab, select an asset from the **Weapons** or **Items** tab, then click **Add to Chest**.

## Details Panel

[![Details](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/50724c29-afda-467f-860a-00e531cffc40?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/50724c29-afda-467f-860a-00e531cffc40?resizing_type=fit)

The right panel of your screen is the **Details** panel, which explains an asset's information and tags. Within this panel are two tabs that contain an asset's attributes and the tags associated with it.

### Information Tab

[![Information](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/aac37f48-8855-4c03-9224-49745766575d?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/aac37f48-8855-4c03-9224-49745766575d?resizing_type=fit)

Select the right tab on the **Details** panel (the information icon) to see a selected asset's details, such as rarity and damage statistics.

[![Information](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/2c41875d-899d-4f46-95e0-eaa03b198196?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/2c41875d-899d-4f46-95e0-eaa03b198196?resizing_type=fit)

You can also select the information icon above the asset to view its details and tags.

### Menu Tab

[![Menu](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/3fdc7f56-2399-418b-97a5-bb3da47820d7?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/3fdc7f56-2399-418b-97a5-bb3da47820d7?resizing_type=fit)

**Tag** are ways to identify and categorize assets by theme and usage.

Within the **Details** panel, you can also select the menu icon to sort through assets in the Creative inventory by their tags. You can select one or multiple tags by selecting their checkboxes.

[![Union and Intersect](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/d5941a9e-3eee-4119-95a5-b296baef3171?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/d5941a9e-3eee-4119-95a5-b296baef3171?resizing_type=fit)

In this panel, you can further select tags through the **Union** and **Intersect** tabs. The **Union** tab shows every asset that falls in the selected tag. You can select the **Intersect** tab to only display assets that share similar tags.

[![Clear and Mode](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/f74675d6-f599-451e-91f6-f13b771985bc?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/f74675d6-f599-451e-91f6-f13b771985bc?resizing_type=fit)

Within the **Menu** tab, use the **Clear** and **Mode** functions to clear assets or switch between modes.

[![Tags](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/faf3a712-1d15-4d65-b837-7d5a092be9e3?resizing_type=fit)](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/faf3a712-1d15-4d65-b837-7d5a092be9e3?resizing_type=fit)

To clear the tags above the inventory assets, you can either press **ALT + C** on your keyboard or right-click them.

Press **ALT + F** on your keyboard to access **Mode**, which automatically switches between the **Union** and **Intersect** tabs.
